transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		extraction_date as string,
		case_metadata_event_id as long,
		ce_case_data_id as integer,
		ce_created_date as long,
		ce_case_type_id as string,
		ce_case_type_version as integer,
		ce_state_id as string,
		ce_data as string,
		cd_checklist as string,
		cd_appealType as string,
		cd_newMatters as string,
		cd_legalRepName as string,
		cd_hasNewMatters as string,
		cd_appellantTitle as string,
		cd_hasOtherAppeals as string,
		cd_legalRepCompany as string,
		cd_appellantFamilyName as string,
		cd_appellantGivenNames as string,
		cd_appellantDateOfBirth as string,
		cd_appealReferenceNumber as string,
		cd_appellantNationalities as string,
		cd_homeOfficeDecisionDate as string,
		cd_appealGroundsForDisplay as string,
		cd_appealGroundsProtection as string,
		cd_appellantNameForDisplay as string,
		cd_legalRepReferenceNumber as string,
		cd_appealGroundsHumanRights as string,
		cd_appellantHasFixedAddress as string,
		cd_homeOfficeReferenceNumber as string,
		cd_sendDirectionActionAvailable as string,
		cd_currentCaseStateVisibleToCaseOfficer as string,
		cd_changeDirectionDueDateActionAvailable as string,
		cd_currentCaseStateVisibleToAdminOfficer as string,
		cd_uploadAddendumEvidenceActionAvailable as string,
		cd_currentCaseStateVisibleToHomeOfficeAll as string,
		cd_currentCaseStateVisibleToHomeOfficeApc as string,
		cd_currentCaseStateVisibleToHomeOfficePou as string,
		cd_currentCaseStateVisibleToHomeOfficeLart as string,
		cd_uploadAdditionalEvidenceActionAvailable as string,
		cd_currentCaseStateVisibleToHomeOfficeGeneric as string,
		cd_haveHearingAttendeesAndDurationBeenRecorded as string,
		cd_currentCaseStateVisibleToLegalRepresentative as string,
		cd_uploadAddendumEvidenceLegalRepActionAvailable as string,
		cd_uploadAddendumEvidenceHomeOfficeActionAvailable as string,
		cd_uploadAdditionalEvidenceHomeOfficeActionAvailable as string,
		cd_hearingCentre as string,
		cd_notificationsSent as string,
		cd_legalRepDeclaration as string,
		cd_submissionOutOfTime as string,
		cd_appealSubmissionDate as string,
		cd_legalRepresentativeName as string,
		cd_legalRepresentativeDocuments as string,
		cd_legalRepresentativeEmailAddress as string,
		cd_directions as string,
		cd_uploadHomeOfficeBundleAvailable as string,
		cd_respondentDocuments as string,
		cd_uploadedHomeOfficeBundleDocs as string,
		cd_caseBuildingReadyForSubmission as string,
		cd_caseArgumentDocument as string,
		cd_caseArgumentEvidence as string,
		cd_caseArgumentAvailable as string,
		cd_caseArgumentDescription as string,
		cd_respondentReviewAppealResponseAdded as string,
		cd_uploadHomeOfficeAppealResponseActionAvailable as string,
		cd_appealResponseAvailable as string,
		cd_amendResponseActionAvailable as string,
		cd_reviewResponseActionAvailable as string,
		cd_uploadedHomeOfficeAppealResponseDocs as string,
		cd_hearingDocuments as string,
		cd_listCaseHearingDate as string,
		cd_ariaListingReference as string,
		cd_listCaseHearingCentre as string,
		cd_listCaseHearingLength as string,
		cd_caseSummaryDocument as string,
		cd_caseSummaryDescription as string,
		cd_scheduleOfIssuesAgreement as string,
		cd_caseIntroductionDescription as string,
		cd_decisionAndReasonsAvailable as string,
		cd_immigrationHistoryAgreement as string,
		cd_appellantCaseSummaryDescription as string,
		cd_agreedImmigrationHistoryDescription as string,
		cd_appellantsAgreedScheduleOfIssuesDescription as string,
		cd_addendumEvidenceDocuments as string,
		cd_appealGroundsRevocation as string,
		cd_journeyType as string,
		cd_appellantAddress as string,
		cd_subscriptions as string,
		cd_anonymityOrder as string,
		cd_appellantRepresentative as string,
		cd_respondentRepresentative as string,
		cd_draftDecisionAndReasonsDocuments as string,
		cd_appealDate as string,
		cd_appealDecision as string,
		cd_isDecisionAllowed as string,
		cd_isDocumentSignedToday as string,
		cd_finalDecisionAndReasonsPdf as string,
		cd_isFeeConsistentWithDecision as string,
		cd_decisionAndReasonsCoverLetter as string,
		cd_finalDecisionAndReasonsDocuments as string,
		cd_reviewHomeOfficeResponseByLegalRep as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	wildcardPaths:['asylum-2020-05.jsonl']) ~> AsylumDW
MapDrifted1 aggregate(groupBy(ce_case_data_id),
	ce_created_date = first(ce_created_date)) ~> Aggregate1
AsylumDW select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(extraction_date = toString(byName('extraction_date')),
		case_metadata_event_id = toLong(byName('case_metadata_event_id')),
		ce_case_data_id = toInteger(byName('ce_case_data_id')),
		ce_created_date = toLong(byName('ce_created_date')),
		ce_case_type_id = toString(byName('ce_case_type_id')),
		ce_case_type_version = toInteger(byName('ce_case_type_version')),
		ce_state_id = toString(byName('ce_state_id')),
		ce_data = toString(byName('ce_data')),
		cd_checklist = toString(byName('cd_checklist')),
		cd_appealType = toString(byName('cd_appealType')),
		cd_newMatters = toString(byName('cd_newMatters')),
		cd_legalRepName = toString(byName('cd_legalRepName')),
		cd_hasNewMatters = toString(byName('cd_hasNewMatters')),
		cd_appellantTitle = toString(byName('cd_appellantTitle')),
		cd_hasOtherAppeals = toString(byName('cd_hasOtherAppeals')),
		cd_legalRepCompany = toString(byName('cd_legalRepCompany')),
		cd_appellantFamilyName = toString(byName('cd_appellantFamilyName')),
		cd_appellantGivenNames = toString(byName('cd_appellantGivenNames')),
		cd_appellantDateOfBirth = toString(byName('cd_appellantDateOfBirth')),
		cd_appealReferenceNumber = toString(byName('cd_appealReferenceNumber')),
		cd_appellantNationalities = toString(byName('cd_appellantNationalities')),
		cd_homeOfficeDecisionDate = toString(byName('cd_homeOfficeDecisionDate')),
		cd_appealGroundsForDisplay = toString(byName('cd_appealGroundsForDisplay')),
		cd_appealGroundsProtection = toString(byName('cd_appealGroundsProtection')),
		cd_appellantNameForDisplay = toString(byName('cd_appellantNameForDisplay')),
		cd_legalRepReferenceNumber = toString(byName('cd_legalRepReferenceNumber')),
		cd_appealGroundsHumanRights = toString(byName('cd_appealGroundsHumanRights')),
		cd_appellantHasFixedAddress = toString(byName('cd_appellantHasFixedAddress')),
		cd_homeOfficeReferenceNumber = toString(byName('cd_homeOfficeReferenceNumber')),
		cd_sendDirectionActionAvailable = toString(byName('cd_sendDirectionActionAvailable')),
		cd_currentCaseStateVisibleToCaseOfficer = toString(byName('cd_currentCaseStateVisibleToCaseOfficer')),
		cd_changeDirectionDueDateActionAvailable = toString(byName('cd_changeDirectionDueDateActionAvailable')),
		cd_currentCaseStateVisibleToAdminOfficer = toString(byName('cd_currentCaseStateVisibleToAdminOfficer')),
		cd_uploadAddendumEvidenceActionAvailable = toString(byName('cd_uploadAddendumEvidenceActionAvailable')),
		cd_currentCaseStateVisibleToHomeOfficeAll = toString(byName('cd_currentCaseStateVisibleToHomeOfficeAll')),
		cd_currentCaseStateVisibleToHomeOfficeApc = toString(byName('cd_currentCaseStateVisibleToHomeOfficeApc')),
		cd_currentCaseStateVisibleToHomeOfficePou = toString(byName('cd_currentCaseStateVisibleToHomeOfficePou')),
		cd_currentCaseStateVisibleToHomeOfficeLart = toString(byName('cd_currentCaseStateVisibleToHomeOfficeLart')),
		cd_uploadAdditionalEvidenceActionAvailable = toString(byName('cd_uploadAdditionalEvidenceActionAvailable')),
		cd_currentCaseStateVisibleToHomeOfficeGeneric = toString(byName('cd_currentCaseStateVisibleToHomeOfficeGeneric')),
		cd_haveHearingAttendeesAndDurationBeenRecorded = toString(byName('cd_haveHearingAttendeesAndDurationBeenRecorded')),
		cd_currentCaseStateVisibleToLegalRepresentative = toString(byName('cd_currentCaseStateVisibleToLegalRepresentative')),
		cd_uploadAddendumEvidenceLegalRepActionAvailable = toString(byName('cd_uploadAddendumEvidenceLegalRepActionAvailable')),
		cd_uploadAddendumEvidenceHomeOfficeActionAvailable = toString(byName('cd_uploadAddendumEvidenceHomeOfficeActionAvailable')),
		cd_uploadAdditionalEvidenceHomeOfficeActionAvailable = toString(byName('cd_uploadAdditionalEvidenceHomeOfficeActionAvailable')),
		cd_hearingCentre = toString(byName('cd_hearingCentre')),
		cd_notificationsSent = toString(byName('cd_notificationsSent')),
		cd_legalRepDeclaration = toString(byName('cd_legalRepDeclaration')),
		cd_submissionOutOfTime = toString(byName('cd_submissionOutOfTime')),
		cd_appealSubmissionDate = toString(byName('cd_appealSubmissionDate')),
		cd_legalRepresentativeName = toString(byName('cd_legalRepresentativeName')),
		cd_legalRepresentativeDocuments = toString(byName('cd_legalRepresentativeDocuments')),
		cd_legalRepresentativeEmailAddress = toString(byName('cd_legalRepresentativeEmailAddress')),
		cd_directions = toString(byName('cd_directions')),
		cd_uploadHomeOfficeBundleAvailable = toString(byName('cd_uploadHomeOfficeBundleAvailable')),
		cd_respondentDocuments = toString(byName('cd_respondentDocuments')),
		cd_uploadedHomeOfficeBundleDocs = toString(byName('cd_uploadedHomeOfficeBundleDocs')),
		cd_caseBuildingReadyForSubmission = toString(byName('cd_caseBuildingReadyForSubmission')),
		cd_caseArgumentDocument = toString(byName('cd_caseArgumentDocument')),
		cd_caseArgumentEvidence = toString(byName('cd_caseArgumentEvidence')),
		cd_caseArgumentAvailable = toString(byName('cd_caseArgumentAvailable')),
		cd_caseArgumentDescription = toString(byName('cd_caseArgumentDescription')),
		cd_respondentReviewAppealResponseAdded = toString(byName('cd_respondentReviewAppealResponseAdded')),
		cd_uploadHomeOfficeAppealResponseActionAvailable = toString(byName('cd_uploadHomeOfficeAppealResponseActionAvailable')),
		cd_appealResponseAvailable = toString(byName('cd_appealResponseAvailable')),
		cd_amendResponseActionAvailable = toString(byName('cd_amendResponseActionAvailable')),
		cd_reviewResponseActionAvailable = toString(byName('cd_reviewResponseActionAvailable')),
		cd_uploadedHomeOfficeAppealResponseDocs = toString(byName('cd_uploadedHomeOfficeAppealResponseDocs')),
		cd_hearingDocuments = toString(byName('cd_hearingDocuments')),
		cd_listCaseHearingDate = toString(byName('cd_listCaseHearingDate')),
		cd_ariaListingReference = toString(byName('cd_ariaListingReference')),
		cd_listCaseHearingCentre = toString(byName('cd_listCaseHearingCentre')),
		cd_listCaseHearingLength = toString(byName('cd_listCaseHearingLength')),
		cd_caseSummaryDocument = toString(byName('cd_caseSummaryDocument')),
		cd_caseSummaryDescription = toString(byName('cd_caseSummaryDescription')),
		cd_scheduleOfIssuesAgreement = toString(byName('cd_scheduleOfIssuesAgreement')),
		cd_caseIntroductionDescription = toString(byName('cd_caseIntroductionDescription')),
		cd_decisionAndReasonsAvailable = toString(byName('cd_decisionAndReasonsAvailable')),
		cd_immigrationHistoryAgreement = toString(byName('cd_immigrationHistoryAgreement')),
		cd_appellantCaseSummaryDescription = toString(byName('cd_appellantCaseSummaryDescription')),
		cd_agreedImmigrationHistoryDescription = toString(byName('cd_agreedImmigrationHistoryDescription')),
		cd_appellantsAgreedScheduleOfIssuesDescription = toString(byName('cd_appellantsAgreedScheduleOfIssuesDescription')),
		cd_addendumEvidenceDocuments = toString(byName('cd_addendumEvidenceDocuments')),
		cd_appealGroundsRevocation = toString(byName('cd_appealGroundsRevocation')),
		cd_journeyType = toString(byName('cd_journeyType')),
		cd_appellantAddress = toString(byName('cd_appellantAddress')),
		cd_subscriptions = toString(byName('cd_subscriptions')),
		cd_anonymityOrder = toString(byName('cd_anonymityOrder')),
		cd_appellantRepresentative = toString(byName('cd_appellantRepresentative')),
		cd_respondentRepresentative = toString(byName('cd_respondentRepresentative')),
		cd_draftDecisionAndReasonsDocuments = toString(byName('cd_draftDecisionAndReasonsDocuments')),
		cd_appealDate = toString(byName('cd_appealDate')),
		cd_appealDecision = toString(byName('cd_appealDecision')),
		cd_isDecisionAllowed = toString(byName('cd_isDecisionAllowed')),
		cd_isDocumentSignedToday = toString(byName('cd_isDocumentSignedToday')),
		cd_finalDecisionAndReasonsPdf = toString(byName('cd_finalDecisionAndReasonsPdf')),
		cd_isFeeConsistentWithDecision = toString(byName('cd_isFeeConsistentWithDecision')),
		cd_decisionAndReasonsCoverLetter = toString(byName('cd_decisionAndReasonsCoverLetter')),
		cd_finalDecisionAndReasonsDocuments = toString(byName('cd_finalDecisionAndReasonsDocuments')),
		cd_reviewHomeOfficeResponseByLegalRep = toString(byName('cd_reviewHomeOfficeResponseByLegalRep'))) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1, Aggregate1 join(MapDrifted1@ce_case_data_id == Aggregate1@ce_case_data_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		extraction_date as string,
		case_metadata_event_id as string,
		ce_case_data_id as string,
		ce_created_date as string,
		ce_case_type_id as string,
		ce_case_type_version as string,
		ce_state_id as string,
		ce_data as (D8Cohort as string, createdDate as string, D8DivorceWho as string, D8Connections as (A as string, C as string), D8DivorceUnit as string, D8MarriageDate as string, D8caseReference as string, D8FinancialOrder as string, D8PetitionerEmail as string, D8DivorceClaimFrom as string[], D8LegalProceedings as string, D8ReasonForDivorce as string, D8ScreenHasPrinter as string, D8StatementOfTruth as string, D8DivorceCostsClaim as string, D8FinancialOrderFor as string[], D8MarriageCanDivorce as string, D8PetitionerLastName as string, D8RespondentLastName as string, D8PetitionerFirstName as string, D8RespondentFirstName as string, D8HelpWithFeesNeedHelp as string, D8PetitionerHomeAddress as (PostCode as string), D8PetitionerPhoneNumber as string, D8RespondentHomeAddress as (PostCode as string), D8ScreenHasMarriageCert as string, D8DerivedStatementOfCase as string, D8JurisdictionConnection as string[], D8MarriagePetitionerName as string, D8MarriageRespondentName as string, D8LegalProceedingsDetails as string, D8LegalProceedingsRelated as string[], D8MarriageIsSameSexCouple as string, D8ScreenHasMarriageBroken as string, D8InferredPetitionerGender as string, D8InferredRespondentGender as string, D8PetitionerNameChangedHow as string[], D8ClaimsCostsAppliedForFees as string, D8HelpWithFeesAppliedForFees as string, D8JurisdictionConfidentLegal as string, D8ScreenHasRespondentAddress as string, D8HelpWithFeesReferenceNumber as string, D8ReasonForDivorceHasMarriage as string, D8DerivedPetitionerHomeAddress as string, D8DerivedRespondentCurrentName as string, D8DerivedRespondentHomeAddress as string, D8ReasonForDivorceLimitReasons as string, D8ReasonForDivorceShowAdultery as string, D8RespondentLivesAtLastAddress as string, D8ReasonForDivorceShowDesertion as string, D8DerivedRespondentSolicitorAddr as string, D8LivingArrangementsLiveTogether as string, D8ReasonForDivorceEnableAdultery as string, D8JurisdictionPetitionerResidence as string, D8JurisdictionRespondentResidence as string, D8PetitionerCorrespondenceAddress as (PostCode as string), D8ReasonForDivorceAdulteryIsNamed as string, D8RespondentCorrespondenceAddress as (PostCode as string), D8DerivedPetitionerCurrentFullName as string, D8ReasonForDivorceBehaviourDetails as string, D8ReasonForDivorceClaimingAdultery as string, D8DerivedRespondentSolicitorDetails as string, D8DerivedPetitionerCorrespondenceAddr as string, D8DerivedRespondentCorrespondenceAddr as string, D8LivingArrangementsLastLivedTogether as string, D8PetitionerContactDetailsConfidential as string, D8PetitionerNameDifferentToMarriageCert as string, D8DerivedLivingArrangementsLastLivedAddr as string, D8PetitionerCorrespondenceUseHomeAddress as string, D8ReasonForDivorceClaiming5YearSeparatio as string, D8ReasonForDivorceShowFiveYearsSeparatio as string, D8ReasonForDivorceShowTwoYearsSeparation as string, D8ReasonForDivorceShowUnreasonableBehavi as string, D8RespondentCorrespondenceUseHomeAddress as string, CoRespLetterHolderId as string, Payments as (id as string, value as (PaymentDate as string, PaymentFeeId as string, PaymentAmount as string, PaymentSiteId as string, PaymentStatus as string, PaymentChannel as string, PaymentReference as string, PaymentTransactionId as string))[], RespondentContactDetailsConfidential as string, CoRespEmailAddress as string, CoRespLinkedToCase as string, CoRespLinkedToCaseDate as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Source01
Source01 derive(ce_data = ce_data.D8DivorceWho,
		D8Cohort = ce_data.D8Cohort) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
